name: Legal Eagles
description: Command the courtroom with powerful legal strategies, objections, and witness manipulation

cards.title: Supreme Advocate
cards.description: Master of legal argumentation with an unbeatable track record
cards.imageDescription: Distinguished lawyer in court robes, confidently presenting a compelling case
cards.effect: On summon: draw 2 cards; Passive: +1 card per turn
cards.flavor: Justice is not just blind, it's also brilliant.

cards.title: Objection!
cards.description: A powerful legal objection that disrupts your opponent's strategy
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer dramatically pointing and shouting 'Objection!' in a packed courtroom
cards.effect: Negate the next opponent action, gain 3 MP
cards.flavor: Sustained! Your honor, I object to this entire line of questioning.

cards.title: Key Witness Testimony
cards.description: Call a crucial witness who provides game-changing evidence
cards.imageDescription: Important witness taking the stand and pointing to the defendant
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, opponent discards 2 cards
cards.flavor: The truth will set you free, but first it will blow your case wide open.

cards.title: Rigorous Cross-Examination
cards.description: Tear apart your opponent's case with pointed questions
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer aggressively questioning a nervous witness on the stand
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, then choose 1 card for them to discard
cards.flavor: Every lie has a crack, and I know exactly where to hit.

cards.title: Exploit Legal Loophole
cards.description: Find a technicality that saves you from a losing position
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer studying thick law books, finding a small clause highlighted
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: It's not cheating if it's in the rulebook.

cards.title: Subpoena
cards.description: Force your opponent to reveal their hand
cards.imageDescription: Court officer delivering official legal documents to a surprised person
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: You have the right to remain silent, but I have the right to know what you're hiding.

cards.title: Out-of-Court Settlement
cards.description: Negotiate a favorable deal that benefits both parties
cards.imageDescription: Two lawyers shaking hands across a conference table with documents
cards.effect: Restore 3 HP to all your champions, gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: Sometimes the best victory is the one where everyone wins.

cards.title: Contempt of Court
cards.description: Punish your opponent for unsportsmanlike conduct
cards.imageDescription: Judge angrily pointing at a misbehaving person in the courtroom
cards.effect: Opponent loses 2 MP regeneration this turn, you gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Order in the court! Show some respect for the legal process.

cards.title: Hung Jury
cards.description: A group of jurors who can't reach a verdict, causing delays
cards.imageDescription: Group of diverse jurors in the jury box, looking confused and debating
cards.effect: On summon: All champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: Twelve minds, one indecision.

cards.title: Private Investigator
cards.description: A skilled detective who uncovers hidden evidence
cards.imageDescription: Private eye in trench coat, examining clues with magnifying glass
cards.effect: When attacking: Look at opponent's hand; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn
cards.flavor: The truth is out there, and I'm going to find it.

cards.title: Chief Justice
cards.description: The highest judicial authority whose rulings shape the entire legal landscape
cards.imageDescription: Chief Justice in ornate robes, holding gavel with supreme authority in grand courtroom
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: All your cards cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 1 card
cards.flavor: The final word in justice, delivered with absolute authority.

cards.title: Supreme Court Justice
cards.description: The ultimate arbiter of legal precedent with the power to reshape entire legal systems
cards.imageDescription: Distinguished Supreme Court Justice in ceremonial robes, seated on an ornate bench with legal tomes
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 2 cards
cards.flavor: The law is not just written in books, but carved in the very foundation of justice.

cards.title: Corporate Raider
cards.description: A ruthless business attorney who specializes in hostile takeovers and corporate warfare
cards.imageDescription: Sharp-dressed corporate lawyer in an expensive suit, standing in a boardroom with takeover documents
cards.effect: On summon: All opponent champions lose 2 MP regeneration; Passive: When you play an event, deal 1 damage to all opponents; When attacking: +3 damage if MP >= 3
cards.flavor: In the courtroom of commerce, I am both judge and executioner.

cards.title: Master Criminal Defense Attorney
cards.description: The legendary lawyer who has never lost a case and can get anyone acquitted
cards.imageDescription: Charismatic defense attorney passionately arguing in court, jury captivated by their words
cards.effect: On summon: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by enemy effects; When attacking: Heal 2 HP to player
cards.flavor: Everyone deserves representation, but not everyone deserves to win. I make sure my clients do.

cards.title: International Lawyer
cards.description: A legal expert in global affairs who can navigate the complex web of international law
cards.imageDescription: Sophisticated lawyer in an international setting, surrounded by flags and diplomatic documents
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random rare legal cards to your hand; Passive: All your events cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Deal damage equal to the number of different card types you've played this turn
cards.flavor: The law knows no borders, but I know how to bend them.

cards.title: Legal Eagle
cards.description: The ultimate legal strategist who can find victory in the most impossible situations
cards.imageDescription: Brilliant lawyer surrounded by legal documents, eyes sharp with tactical insight
cards.effect: On summon: Look at opponent's entire hand and choose 2 cards to discard; Passive: When you play a tactic, gain 1 MP; When attacking: +2 damage if you control a creature
cards.flavor: In the game of law, I don't just play by the rules - I rewrite them.

cards.title: Legal Strategy
cards.description: A masterful legal strategy that adapts to any situation
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer studying case files with strategic planning board showing multiple legal approaches
cards.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 2 to draw, shuffle the rest back
cards.flavor: Every case has a winning angle, you just need to find it.

cards.title: Courtroom Drama
cards.description: Create a dramatic scene that distracts and confuses your opponent
cards.imageDescription: Chaotic courtroom scene with lawyers arguing dramatically, judge trying to restore order
cards.effect: Opponent cannot play events next turn, all champions gain +1 AP this turn
cards.flavor: The best defense is a good offense, and the best offense is good theater.

cards.title: Evidence Suppression
cards.description: Suppress damaging evidence through legal technicalities
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer dramatically objecting while court clerk removes evidence from the table
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to target champion this turn, opponent loses 2 MP
cards.flavor: The evidence may be damning, but the law is on my side.

cards.title: Witness Intimidation
cards.description: Intimidate a witness to prevent them from testifying effectively
cards.imageDescription: Intimidating lawyer leaning over witness stand, witness looking nervous and hesitant
cards.effect: Target champion cannot attack next turn, opponent discards 1 card
cards.flavor: The truth is only as strong as the witness's courage.

cards.title: Intensive Legal Research
cards.description: Conduct thorough research to find the perfect legal precedent
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer surrounded by stacks of law books and legal databases, highlighting key passages
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards, then choose 1 to play for free this turn
cards.flavor: The law is vast, but I know exactly where to look.

cards.title: Plea Bargain
cards.description: Negotiate a deal that benefits both parties
cards.imageDescription: Lawyers shaking hands across a table with signed documents, both looking satisfied
cards.effect: Restore 4 HP to target champion, opponent gains 2 MP
cards.flavor: Sometimes the best justice is the one that everyone can live with.

cards.title: Discovery Motion
cards.description: File a motion to discover your opponent's hidden strategies
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer presenting legal documents to court clerk, requesting discovery of evidence
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, choose 1 card they must discard
cards.flavor: Sunshine is the best disinfectant, especially in court.

cards.title: Court Clerk Assistance
cards.description: Get help from the court clerk to manage paperwork
cards.imageDescription: Court clerk efficiently organizing and filing legal documents at the clerk's desk
cards.effect: Draw 1 card, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: The real work of law happens in the details.

cards.title: Legal Brief
cards.description: Submit a well-crafted legal brief that strengthens your position
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer presenting a polished legal brief to the judge, who reads it with interest
cards.effect: Target champion gains +2 AP this turn
cards.flavor: The pen may not be mightier than the sword, but it's a lot cheaper to file.

cards.title: Court Security
cards.description: Call for court security to maintain order
cards.imageDescription: Court security officers maintaining order in a busy courtroom, ensuring decorum
cards.effect: Prevent 2 damage to your champions this turn
cards.flavor: Order in the court is not optional.

cards.title: Jury Selection
cards.description: Carefully select jurors who will be favorable to your case
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer examining potential jurors during voir dire, making strategic selections
cards.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose 1 to put in your hand
cards.flavor: A fair trial starts with a fair jury.

cards.title: Legal Filing
cards.description: File important legal documents that advance your case
cards.imageDescription: Lawyer submitting legal documents to the court, checking off filing requirements
cards.effect: Gain 2 MP, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Every case is built on a foundation of properly filed documents.

cards.title: Court Reporter
cards.description: Ensure every word is recorded for the official transcript
cards.imageDescription: Court reporter typing rapidly on a stenotype machine, capturing every word
cards.effect: Draw 1 card, prevent 1 damage to target champion this turn
cards.flavor: The record speaks for itself, and I make sure it speaks clearly.

cards.title: Legal Secretary
cards.description: Get assistance from an efficient legal secretary
cards.imageDescription: Legal secretary efficiently managing files and scheduling, supporting the legal team
cards.effect: Restore 2 HP to target champion, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Behind every great lawyer is an even greater secretary.

cards.title: Court Interpreter
cards.description: Provide translation services for better communication
cards.imageDescription: Court interpreter facilitating communication between judge, lawyers, and foreign witness
cards.effect: Target champion can attack this turn even if it couldn't before
cards.flavor: Justice transcends language barriers.

cards.title: Legal Intern
cards.description: An eager law student ready to assist with basic legal tasks
cards.imageDescription: Young law student in suit, carrying files and ready to help with legal research
cards.effect: Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn
cards.flavor: The future of law, ready to learn and eager to help.

cards.title: Paralegal
cards.description: A skilled legal assistant who handles complex documentation
cards.imageDescription: Professional paralegal organizing case files and legal documents with precision
cards.effect: When attacking: Look at opponent's hand; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: The backbone of any successful legal practice.
